item.title: 债券交易员认为通胀数据是下一次降息的关键
item.description: 债券交易员们希望在动荡的一年结束时能够平稳度过；除非通胀率出人意料地飙升，让他们再次陷入困境。【原文：Bond traders are hoping to coast to the end of a volatile year — unless a surprise jump in inflation throws them another curve.】

item.title: 赞比亚与法国签署债务重组协议历时四年
item.description: 赞比亚和法国签署了一项双边债务重组协议，这是自四年前这个南部非洲国家违约开始的旷日持久的进程中的关键一步。【原文：Zambia and France signed a bilateral debt restructuring agreement, a key step in a protracted process that started when the southern African nation defaulted four years ago.】

item.title: 乘客企图强行改变墨西哥飞往美国的航班航向
item.description: 据墨西哥一家主要航空公司 Volaris 称，周日，墨西哥国内航班上的一名乘客企图强行将飞机改道飞往美国。【原文：A passenger on a domestic flight in Mexico attempted to divert the plane to the US by force on Sunday, according to Volaris, one of the country’s main airlines.】

item.title: 圭亚那和苏里南选择中国公司建造价值 2.36 亿美元的大桥
item.description: 圭亚那公共工程部部长胡安-埃德希尔（Juan Edghill）周日表示，圭亚那和苏里南选择中国路桥集团建造一座价值 2.36 亿美元的大桥，以连接这两个南美国家，横跨接壤的科伦蒂讷河。【原文：Guyana and Suriname picked China Road & Bridge Corp. to build a $236 million bridge to link the two South American countries across the bordering Corentyne River, Guyana’s Public Works Minister Juan Edghill said Sunday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，宏盟正在就收购 Interpublic 进行深入谈判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，宏盟集团（Omnicom Group Inc.【原文：Omnicom Group Inc. is in advanced talks to buy Interpublic Group in a deal that would would create the world’s largest advertising firm, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据说 CVC 正在探索收购德国软件公司 CompuGroup
item.description: 据知情人士透露，CVC Capital Partners Plc 正在探索收购德国医疗保健行业软件供应商 CompuGroup Medical SE & Co.KGaA，这是一家德国医疗保健行业软件供应商。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc is exploring an acquisition of CompuGroup Medical SE & Co. KGaA, a German software provider to the healthcare sector, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普在美国全国广播公司（NBC）节目中表示，他没有接替鲍威尔担任美联储主席的计划
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他没有计划在重返白宫后撤换美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔，他说："我看不到这一点"。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump said he has no plans to replace Fed Chair Jerome Powell once he returns to the White House, saying “I don’t see it.”】

item.title: 人民币、欧元走势表明新兴市场货币将遭受损失
item.description: 近几个月来，人民币和欧元的跌势加剧，这使得亚洲和欧洲新兴市场货币的前景更加暗淡。【原文：Losses in the Chinese yuan and the euro have picked up in recent months, and that is worsening the outlook for emerging-market currencies in Asia and Europe.】

item.title: 俄罗斯输往中国的管道天然气流量创下新的日记录
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）称，该公司周六创下了向中国每日供应管道天然气的新纪录。【原文：Gazprom said it set a new record for daily pipeline gas supplies to China on Saturday.】

item.title: 苹果与索尼讨论合作开发 Vision Pro 游戏控制器
item.description: 苹果和索尼正在讨论建立合作关系，这可能会改变 Vision Pro 上的游戏模式。还有苹果公司为内部蜂窝调制解调器芯片制定了三年路线图；特斯拉推出 Apple Watch 应用程序；首批真正有用的苹果智能功能即将推出。最后：苹果零售主管重获旧头衔，公司芯片高管可能进入英特尔首席执行官候选名单。【原文：Apple and Sony have discussed forging a partnership that could change gaming on the Vision Pro. Also: Apple has a three-year road map for its in-house cellular modem chips; Tesla launches an Apple Watch app; and the first truly useful Apple Intelligence features are imminent. And finally: Apple’s retail chief gets her old title back, and the company’s chip executive is likely to be on Intel’s CEO short list.】

item.title: 中国监管机构寻求改善房地产市场：新华社
item.description: 据新华社周日报道，中国监管机构将通过完善土地使用、税收和其他金融措施来促进房地产市场的发展。【原文：China’s regulators will try to bolster the property market with improved policies on land usage, tax and other financial measures, according to the Xinhua News Agency on Sunday.】

item.title: 韩国政治僵局引发更多波动，交易商做好准备
item.description: 周一市场重新开盘后，交易商正准备迎接韩国资产的持续波动期，韩元和股市在周末的戏剧性事件加深了政治危机后，最初受到了压力。【原文：Traders are bracing for a period of sustained volatility in South Korean assets as markets reopen on Monday, with the won and stocks seen under initial pressure after a weekend of high drama deepened the political crisis.】

item.title: 工党旨在 "彻底改革 "规划系统以实现住房目标
item.description: 工党副首相安吉拉-雷纳（Angela Rayner）在《每日电讯报》上撰文称，工党计划 "彻底改革 "规划系统，以实现五年内在英国新建 150 万套住房的承诺。【原文：Labour plans to “overhaul” the planning system in order to meet its commitment of 1.5 million new homes being built in the UK over five years, deputy prime minister Angela Rayner wrote in the Telegraph.】

item.title: 尹炳世逃脱弹劾后，韩国将面临更多动荡
item.description: 上周末，韩国总统尹锡烈仅以少数几张选票成功避免了弹劾。但是，要求他下台的压力只增不减。【原文：South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol managed to avoid impeachment over the weekend by just a handful of votes. But pressure for him to step down is only intensifying.】

item.title: 肖尔茨称大众关闭工厂可能不是正确的解决方案：报告
item.description: 据 Funke 媒体集团报道，德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）呼吁汽车制造商大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）不要关闭工厂。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz called on car manufacturer Volkswagen AG not to shut down factories, Funke media group reported, even as the leader acknowledged it was up to the company’s owners and labor representatives to discuss the matter.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行采取行动保护意大利业务免受联合信贷银行冲击
item.description: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）决定增持 Banco BPM 的股份，目的是在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）向这家规模较小的意大利竞争对手提出收购要约后，保护其在意大利的业务利益。【原文：Credit Agricole SA’s decision to boost its stake in Banco BPM is aimed at protecting its business interests in Italy after UniCredit SpA made a takeover bid for the smaller Italian competitor.】

item.title: 欧佩克+推迟恢复产量后，沙特阿拉伯下调油价
item.description: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）进一步推迟恢复产量之后，沙特阿拉伯对亚洲买家的油价下调幅度超过预期，这凸显出市场前景依然疲软。【原文：Saudi Arabia is cutting oil prices for buyers in Asia by more than expected after OPEC+ further delayed an output revival, underscoring how the outlook for the market remains weak.】

item.title: 迪拜大型科技公司 IPO 巩固了始于 2021 年的转机
item.description:
塔拉巴特公司 20 亿美元的首次公开募股是迪拜股票市场蓬勃发展的一个重要里程碑。【原文：

Talabat’s $2 billion IPO marks a key milestone for Dubai’s booming stock market.

】

item.title: 卡塔尔大臣斥责欧盟在环境、社会和治理方面越权和合规成本过高
item.description: 卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）首席执行官表示，一项新的欧洲指令为在欧盟运营的大型企业设定了严格的环境、社会和公司治理报告标准，这给卡塔尔能源公司等企业带来了 "完全没有意义 "的挑战。【原文：A new European directive setting strict ESG reporting standards for large firms operating in the EU creates challenges that make “absolutely no sense” for companies like QatarEnergy, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 南非富人的豪华庄园生意兴隆
item.description:
不同奢华程度的庄园住房是该国住宅房地产市场增长最快的部分。【原文：

Housing stock in estates — of varying degrees of luxury — is the fastest-growing segment in the country’s residential property market.

】

item.title: 巴黎和柏林的动荡给法兰克福的欧洲央行政策蒙上阴影
item.description: 长期以来，欧洲中央银行的官员们习惯于在全球动荡不安的时代中摸爬滚打，而现在他们面临的头痛问题离本土更近：欧元区自身核心的领导力危机。【原文：European Central Bank officials long used to navigating troubling times for the world now face a headache far closer to home: a leadership crisis at the heart of the euro zone itself.】

item.title: 沙特金融公司首席执行官在上市几天后去世
item.description: 联合国际控股公司（United International Holding Co.【原文：United International Holding Co. said its chief executive officer has died, just days after the company was listed on Riyadh’s main stock exchange.】

item.title: 英国统计数据多方面失误带来新的政策风险
item.description: 英国有一个数据问题，在英国经济的关键时刻引发了对政策失误的担忧。【原文：Britain has a data problem that is raising fears of policy mis-steps at a critical juncture for the UK economy.】

item.title: VinFast 新电动车工厂将于七月在越南投产
item.description: 根据一封电子邮件声明，VinFast 汽车有限公司位于越南中部河静省的新电动汽车制造厂将于明年 7 月开始运营。【原文：VinFast Auto Ltd.’s new electric vehicle manufacturing plant in Vietnam’s central province of Ha Ting will start operating by July next year, according to an emailed statement.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服集团总裁韩志国将于 3 月就任首席执行官
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团总裁韩志国将从 2025 年 3 月起担任首席执行官。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s President Cyril Han will take on the role of chief executive officer from March 2025.】

item.title: 新一代卡通形象为 Hello Kitty 所有者带来 150% 的回报
item.description: Hello Kitty 今年已经 50 岁了，但如果三丽鸥公司股票的上涨能说明什么的话，这个标志性的猫科动物形象正受到新一代的威胁。【原文：Hello Kitty turned 50 this year, but if the rally in Sanrio Co.’s stock is any guide the iconic cat-like character is under threat from a new generation.】

item.title: 英国施塔默将在阿联酋和沙特之行中推动海湾贸易协议
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）将于下周出访阿拉伯联合酋长国和沙特阿拉伯，推动与海湾国家达成新的自由贸易协定。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer is set to push for a new free trade deal with Gulf countries in a trip to the United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia next week.】

item.title: 纽约市枪击案嫌犯的背包中有夹克，但没有枪支
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在纽约中央公园找到的一个灰色背包与涉嫌杀害医疗保险公司高管布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）的凶手所携带的背包相吻合，里面有一件夹克，但没有枪。【原文：A gray backpack retrieved in New York’s Central Park and matching the description of one carried by the suspected killer of health insurance executive Brian Thompson contained a jacket but not a gun, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国承诺向乌克兰提供 9.88 亿美元的新军事援助
item.description: 美国国防部宣布，美国将额外投入 9.88 亿美元帮助乌克兰抗击俄罗斯的入侵，其中包括火箭系统和无人机系统的弹药。【原文：The US is committing an additional $988 million to help Ukraine fight Russia’s invasion, including munitions for rocket systems and unmanned aerial systems, the Defense Department announced.】

item.title: 特朗普幽灵引发最后一轮利率变动
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫引发全球贸易动荡的前景之前，四大洲的央行将在下周对借贷成本进行最后一轮调整。【原文：Central banks on four continents will make a final flurry of changes to borrowing costs in the coming week, before Donald Trump’s return to the White House raises the prospect of global trade turmoil.】
